TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTableRow extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 表示 控件中的 HTML 元素。

span.span: Represents the HTML element in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``元素表示表中的行。The `` element represents a row in a table. 使用类以编程方式控制``中的 HTML 元素控件。Use the class to programmatically control the `` HTML elements in an control. 类，可以通过在行中指定的背景色、 边框颜色和单元格的高度自定义的表中的行的外观。The class allows you to customize the appearance of a row in a table by specifying the background color, the border color, and the height of the cells in the row. 使用设置这些属性， ，和属性。These attributes are set using the , , and properties. 你可以通过使用控制中的整个行的单元格的内容的对齐方式和属性。You can control the alignment of the contents in the cells for the entire row by using the and properties. 属性控制的单元格的内容的水平对齐方式时属性控制的垂直对齐方式。The property controls the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cells, while the property controls the vertical alignment. 通过使用集合的此类中，你可以以编程方式访问表的一行中的各个单元格。By using the collection of this class, you can programmatically access the individual cells in a row of a table. 这样，你可以控制每个单元格，以及内容的属性。This allows you to control the properties of each cell, as well as the content. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用实例来表示中的行控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use an instance to represent a row in the control. 从检索修改表和其内容的集合。An is retrieved from the collection of the table and its contents are modified. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/CS/htmltablerowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/VB/htmltablerowvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数用于创建对象，表示``表行的元素。This constructor is used to create an object that represents the `` element for a table row. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Tr"文字字符串。The "tr" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例控件替换为控制，并将表放在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中某一行的单元格内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 控件中某一行的单元格内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中的行的单元中指定内容的水平对齐方式控件。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将影响的实例所表示的表的行中的所有单元类。Setting this property affects all cells in a row of a table represented by an instance of the class. 若要将对齐特性应用于单个单元格的行，将设置该单元格的属性。To apply an alignment attribute to a single cell of a row, set the property for that cell. 下表列出可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|对齐的单元格的左边缘与单元格的内容。Aligns the contents of the cell with the left edge of the cell.| |`Center`|对齐单元格中居中的内容。Aligns the contents of the cell in the middle of the cell.| |`Right`|对齐的单元格的右边缘与单元格的内容。Aligns the contents of the cell with the right edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用`Justify`和`Char`作为此属性的值。You can also use `Justify` and `Char` as values for this property. 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持这些功能。However, not all browsers support these features. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来控制整个行中单元格的内容的水平对齐方式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to control the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cells in an entire row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/CS/htmltablerowbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/VB/htmltablerowbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的行的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the row represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的行的背景色。

span.span: The background color of the row represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例所表示的行的背景色类。Use the property to specify the background color of the row represented by an instance of the class. 按名称或使用前面井号字符的十六进制值，则可以指定颜色 （#），在窗体 #RRGGBB 中。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示从 0 到 255 分别表示一种颜色，红色、 绿色和蓝色组件十六进制值。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 # 0000ff> 表示的颜色为蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定对于红色和绿色的组件，而为蓝色组件指定的最大值 (FF) 的最小值 (00)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六个预定义的 HTML 颜色名称和相应的十六进制值，可以用于属性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |浅绿色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |紫红色Fuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |为浅Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |深蓝色Navy|#000080#000080| |橄榄Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |红色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |白银Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |空白White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黄色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 与一起使用的可用颜色属性可以确定从枚举。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制中的行的背景色控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the background color of a row in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/CS/htmltablerowappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/VB/htmltablerowappearancevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的行的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the row represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的行的边框颜色。

span.span: The border color of the row represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例所表示的行的边框颜色类。Use the property to specify the border color of the row represented by an instance of the class. 按名称或使用前面井号字符的十六进制值，则可以指定颜色 （#），在窗体 #RRGGBB 中。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示从 0 到 255 分别表示一种颜色，红色、 绿色和蓝色组件十六进制值。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 # 0000ff> 表示的颜色为蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定对于红色和绿色的组件，而为蓝色组件指定的最大值 (FF) 的最小值 (00)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六个预定义的 HTML 颜色名称和相应的十六进制值，可以用于属性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |浅绿色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |紫红色Fuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |为浅Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |深蓝色Navy|#000080#000080| |橄榄Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |红色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |白银Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |空白White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黄色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 与一起使用的可用颜色属性可以确定从枚举。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制中的行的边框颜色控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the border color of a row in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/CS/htmltablerowappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowAppearance/VB/htmltablerowappearancevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示在 控件的某一行中包含的单元格。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the cells contained in a row of the control.

value.span: ，它包含 控件中某一行中的单元格。

span.span: An that contains the cells of a row in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合以编程方式访问中的行的单元格控件。Use the collection to programmatically access the cells of a row in an control. 您可以以编程方式添加、 删除和插入到集合中的单元格。You can programmatically add, remove, and insert cells in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果有没有定义在行中，一个空的单元格返回对象。If there are no cells defined in a row, an empty object is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合以循环访问所表示的行的单元格对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to iterate through the cells of a row, represented by an object. 单元格然后用新内容更新。The cells are then updated with new content. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/CS/htmltablerowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRow/VB/htmltablerowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个新用来保存行单元格的集合。The method creates a new collection that is used to hold the row cells. 方法主要由扩展 控件功能的控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所代表的行的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the height (in pixels) of the row represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的行的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The height (in pixels) of the row represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例表示单元格的高度 （以像素为单位）类。Use the property to specify the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 行中的所有单元格都具有高度相同。All cells in the row share the same height. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定一个小于表的行中显示的单元格的内容所需大小的高度，则忽略此属性。If you specify a height that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cells in the row of a table, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制中的行的高度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the height of a row in the control. summary.span: 将 控件的子控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's child controls to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供附加格式设置之前和之后调用基类的方法。The method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's method. 附加的格式设置使控件呈现的 HTML 更轻松地将返回的行添加和缩进在呈现之前读取控件的子对象。The additional formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return and indenting before rendering the control's child objects. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供调用基类的之后附加格式设置方法。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 添加的格式设置使控件呈现的 HTML 更易读通过将返回的行添加在结束后``标记。The added formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return after the closing `` tag. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中某一行的单元格内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 控件中某一行的单元格内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: The vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中的行的单元中指定的内容的垂直对齐方式控件。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the content in the cells of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将影响的实例所表示的表的行中的所有单元类。Setting this property affects all cells in a row of a table represented by an instance of the class. 若要将对齐特性应用于单个单元格的行，将设置该单元格的属性。To apply an alignment attribute to a single cell of a row, set the property for that cell. 下表列出可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Top`|将包含该单元格的上边缘的单元格的内容的对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the upper edge of the cell.| |`Middle`|对齐的单元格的中心中的单元格的内容。Aligns the contents of a cell in the center of the cell.| |`Bottom`|将包含该单元格的下边缘的单元格的内容的对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the lower edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 你还可以使用`BaseLine`作为此属性的值。You can also use `BaseLine` as a value for this property. 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持此功能。However, not all browsers support this feature. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制整个行中单元格的内容的垂直对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the vertical alignment of the contents of the cells in an entire row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/CS/htmltablerowbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowBehavior/VB/htmltablerowbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]
